Work
Walk to living-room. Look at the desk where Computer stays. Sit in chair. Switch on computer. Work on computer. Switch off computer.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <desk> (1.357)
[FIND] <desk> (1.357)
[TURNTO] <desk> (1.357)
[LOOKAT] <desk> (1.357)
[FIND] <chair> (1.356)
[SIT] <chair> (1.356)
[FIND] <computer> (1.417)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.417)
[TURNTO] <computer> (1.417)
[WATCH] <computer> (1.417)
[SWITCHOFF] <computer> (1.417)
